member.name: T:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController
member.summary: Provides a way to pause, resume or seek a GIF animation.

member.name: P:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.FrameCount
member.summary: Returns the number of frames in the image.

member.name: P:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.IsPaused
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the animation is paused.

member.name: P:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.IsComplete
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the animation is complete.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.GotoFrame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Seeks the animation to the specified frame index.
member.param: The index of the frame to seek to

member.name: P:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.CurrentFrame
member.summary: Returns the current frame index.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the animation.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.Play
member.summary: Starts or resumes the animation. If the animation is complete, it restarts from the beginning.

member.name: E:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.CurrentFrameChanged
member.summary: Raised when the current frame changes.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes the current object.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the current object.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageAnimationController.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the current object
member.param: true to dispose both managed an unmanaged resources, false to dispose only managed resources

member.name: T:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior
member.summary: Provides attached properties that display animated GIFs in a standard Image control.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAnimatedSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the AnimatedSource attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetAnimatedSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.Media.ImageSource)
member.summary: Sets the value of the AnimatedSource attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.
The animated image to display.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AnimatedSourceProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AnimatedSource attached property.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetRepeatBehavior(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the RepeatBehavior attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: The repeat behavior of the animated image.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetRepeatBehavior(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior)
member.summary: Sets the value of the RepeatBehavior attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.
The repeat behavior of the animated image.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.RepeatBehaviorProperty
member.summary: Identifies the RepeatBehavior attached property.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAnimateInDesignMode(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the value of the AnimateInDesignMode attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: true if GIF animations are shown in design mode; false otherwise.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetAnimateInDesignMode(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of the AnimateInDesignMode attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element on which to set the property value.
true to show GIF animations in design mode; false otherwise.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AnimateInDesignModeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AnimateInDesignMode attached property.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAutoStart(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the AutoStart attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: true if the animation should start immediately when loaded. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.SetAutoStart(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of the AutoStart attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
true if the animation should start immediately when loaded. Otherwise, false.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AutoStartProperty
member.summary: Identifies the AutoStart attached property.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetAnimationController(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the animation controller for the specified Image control.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.GetIsAnimationLoaded(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the IsAnimationLoaded attached property for the specified object.
member.param: The element from which to read the property value.
member.returns: true if the animation is loaded. Otherwise, false.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.IsAnimationLoadedProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsAnimationLoaded attached property.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AnimationLoadedEvent
member.summary: Identifies the AnimationLoaded attached event.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AddAnimationLoadedHandler(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Adds a handler for the AnimationLoaded attached event.
member.param: The UIElement that listens to this event.
The event handler to be added.

member.name: M:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.RemoveAnimationLoadedHandler(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler)
member.summary: Removes a handler for the AnimationLoaded attached event.
member.param: The UIElement that listens to this event.
The event handler to be removed.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.ImageBehavior.AnimationCompletedEvent
member.summary: Identifies the AnimationCompleted attached event.

member.summary: Adds a handler for the AnimationCompleted attached event.

The event handler to be added.

member.summary: Removes a handler for the AnimationCompleted attached event.

The event handler to be removed.

member.name: F:WpfAnimatedGif.Properties.VersionInfo.VersionString
